title: Purchase Refunds
body: Hey are we ever going to get more Purchase Refunds or do we only get 3 forever?

replies.body: "Three wishes, to be exact. And ixnay on the wishing for more wishes. That's it. Three. Uno, dos, tres. No substitutions, exchanges or refunds."

> [{quoted}](name=Ediwir,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=sxo2odlO,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-05-06T23:31:32.190+0000)

> "Three wishes, to be exact. And ixnay on the wishing for more wishes. That's it. Three. Uno, dos, tres. No substitutions, exchanges or refunds."

if you can't wish for more wishes, just wish for more genies.

There is only one genie though.
"the often immitated, but never... duplicated... duplicated... duplicated... duplicated... Genie of the Lamp!"

Now if you were to wish that you became a genie that would be a different story, but you wouldn't be able to grant your own wishes. 
**"Phenomenal cosmic powers... **
######itty bitty living space."
Only three. That's the number of chances Riot gives you to not "accidentally" pick the wrong thing.
